message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a price of $1,150,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value, but $900,000 is simply too low for me to consider.  I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous positions. Would you be willing to discuss a price of $1,025,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $950,000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can you consider this price?
